content.prompt: The most significant cause of the 1973–1974 embargo by the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) was

choices.label: United States support of Israel in the Yom Kippur War
the presence of United States oil companies in the Middle East
the devaluation of the United States dollar
United States assistance in the Shah’s return to power in Iran
increased demand for gasoline and other oil-based products

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
